ğŸ“Œ Key Features:
ğŸ’ªInstant Summarization: Transform any web page into a concise summary with just a click. Whether it's a lengthy article or a detailed report, Groq Summarizer captures the essence in seconds.

ğŸ“Œ Why Groq Summarizer?
In an era of information overload, Groq Summarizer stands out by providing a solution that saves time and enhances productivity with the power of GPT models. ğŸ“Œ What websites are supported?

ğŸ“Œ Do I need a Groq account?
